title: The Skin Store
subtitle: Full-Stack E-Commerce Website
description: An end-to-end e-commerce solution featuring API development, database management, user authentication systems, and frontend optimization for seamless shopping experience.
why: I wanted to challenge myself building something from 0 to 1 with a language and framework I'd never used before.

title: InstaQR
subtitle: QR Code Generator Site
description: A web tool that allows users to quickly create customized QR codes.

title: Q&A Chatbot
subtitle: RAG AI Chatbot
description: A Q&A chatbot that processes .pdf and .txt files for context-aware responses.
notes: I really enjoyed working on this, so I teamed up with others to build a small Character AI clone using RAG architecture and MongoDB.

title: HUEY
subtitle: Restaurant Waitlist System Full-Stack Website
description: (hugh - eey) A unified waitlist platform that allows customers to join queues at different restaurants through a centralized interface.
why: I noticed that restaurants each use their own waitlist systems, forcing users to juggle multiple platforms just to join queues. I wanted to build a centralized solution that simplified the process.

title: MONI
subtitle: Money Tracking iOS App
why: I needed an expense tracker that actually fit how I track my spending; I couldn't find one, so I decided to build one. :)
